meta.Title: WHO'S WHO? [New York Times, Sunday, October 3, 1948]
meta.Author: Henry A. Wolfe

across.question: Famous tenor of old Manhattan Opera House.
Catherine ___, sixth wife of Henry VIII.
Section of Italy ceded to France in 1860.
Popular dance of a few years ago.
Method of protest used by prisoners.
Low man of an acrobatic pyramid.
Section of a city or town: German.

down.question: Professional name of famous operatic soprano (1859–1914).
Pertaining to administrative or executive duties.
A reciter of stale or old matters and arguments.
Wife of Admetus; she died in his stead.
Fees for transporting freight in or about harbors.
Her program now runs one hour.
Holder of medal as "world's best movie actor."
